description:
Downloads from multiple sites. I run it from a bash script called subtitles.sh. You can modify this to set your own language. You can modify the program options for logging into sites:

#!/bin/sh
# script to download subtitles

echo "Enter the Movie/Episode name and press [ENTER]:"
read VIDEO
echo
# Change to script's directory, for drag and drop into bash support
cd "$(dirname "$0")"

subliminal-subtitles download --language en "$VIDEO"
